item.title: {Class Suggestion} Blacksmith
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
I may be a minority, but I don’t like the existance of completed wincon classes. I consider both scorned and inq as highly problematic in that regard (they exist as swing votes that are entirely based on their own bias and whims, there’s no means to sway them by giving them better chances to survive or accomplish their goal because there’s nothing left in the game for them that matters.

Nothings more disheartening than losing a game as BD because 2 BD, 1 scorned 1 possesor is a deadlock and this particular scorned believes the NK is hard and deserves the win, then losing the next game as possesor in a nearly identical situation, with the only difference that this scorneds personality wants the most people to win so he sided with BD.

I personally won’t back any classes that win early and stick around in the game. Personally I’m massively in favor of a removal of inq if it isn’t massively reworked, and needless to say completely opposed to making the problem worse by adding more early win classes.

item.description:
Blacksmith, Neutral, Support

Passive 1: Rough Skin - Immune to death once and poison/bleeding

Night Ability 1: Armour Up - Give a player armour giving them death immunity at night (will not heal poison/bleed). It will stay on him until you change it to be on another player (similar to Scout). Unlimited uses

Night Ability 2: Hardened Armour - Make someone immune to every single type of killing ability. (NOTE: PRINCE EXE IS NOT AFFECTED) 2 use

Goal - Survive to save 2 people using Armour Up/Hardened Armour

Feedback/suggestions are appreciated
